mapper.insert: insert into updateinfo (auid, rank, state, updatetime, updatereason) values (#{auid},#{rank}, #{state}, #{updateTime}, #{updateReason});
mapper.select: select updateinfo.*, customername from updateinfo left join customer on updateinfo.auid = customer.auid where updateinfo.auid = #{auid};
select updateinfo.*, customername from updateinfo left join customer on updateinfo.auid = customer.auid where customer.customername = #{customerName};
select updateinfo.*, customername from updateinfo left join customer on updateinfo.auid = customer.auid order by updateinfo.auid;
